summary: A medium sized, adoption friendly home located near High Hrothgar. Highly detailed and atmospheric house in Solitude architecture.
descriptionHtml:
[b]A medium sized, adoption friendly home located near High Hrothgar. Fully detailed, decorated and atmospheric house in Solitude architecture. Windwatch Tower is free.


[/b][b][img]http://i63.tinypic.com/fz7y8n.jpg[/img]
[/b]

[b]Highlights:[/b]

Bedroom for children (2 beds)
Labeled Storage 
Enchanting and alchemy stations 
Staff enchanting/crafting station
Non respawned Containers
Armor Mannequins
Indoor smithing area
Tanning rack, sharpening wheel, workbench and forge
And more...

[b]Requirements:[/b]

- Dawnguard DLC
- Hearthfires DLC
- Dragonborn DLC
- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?]Expanded Towns and Cities[/url] [color=#f4f4f4](Because of some resources used in this mod)
[/color]- [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores[/url]

[b]Recomended mods:[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18340/?]General Stores by Harvey2112[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?]Expanded Towns and Cities[/url] [color=#f4f4f4] [/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire Multible Adoptions[/url]


[b]Resource Meshes and Textures:[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12394/?]Celtic Decor for skyrim by DarkRider[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2250922/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Blary[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/?tab=3&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D16525%26gid%3D110]Oaristys[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945/?tb=mods&pUp=1]InsanitySorrow[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/776954/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Tamira[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3162929/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Berticus0001[/url]
[url=http://tesalliance.org/forums/index.php?/topic/4962-list-skyrim-modders-resources/]Tes Alliance[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2811323/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Jet4571[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4672007/?tb=mods&pUp=1]Darkfox127[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43143/?]FPI Experiment Pack 1[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36969/?]Stroti[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?]Missjennabee[/url]


[b]Install:[/b]

1. Download with NMM
2. Install manually content of archive in Skyrim/Data folder

[b]Uninstall:[/b]

1. With NMM
2. Delete esp file and related files from this mod from Skyrim/Data folder


-----------------------------------------------------
[b]This is my very first mod, so If you have any ideas on how I could improve this mod please let me know![/b]
If I have left anyone out when I gave credits, please let me know and I will add you to the list.
author: Theresethessy
